body_html:
@zdevito I haven't analyzed it carefully yet, but single pass should be fine as long as the analysis is conservative - assuming values may alias by default.

An optimistic analysis (no alias by default) with iterated RPO propagation is probably optimal.

An optimistic analysis (no alias by default) with iterated RPO propagation is probably optimal.
body:
@zdevito I haven't analyzed it carefully yet, but single pass should be fine as long as the analysis is conservative - assuming values may alias by default.

An optimistic analysis (no alias by default) with iterated RPO propagation is probably optimal.
